resources.string:
"How to play.

1. Click the Deal Button to start game.
2. Click Deal again to play one round of War.
3.The highest Card will Win.
4.Face cards are worth their order value.
(ie. Jacks = 11, Kings = 13, etc).
5.Ace cards are worth 14.
6.The Card's Suit will add 1 to its value when compared against certain Suits.
7.Clubs beat Diamonds. Diamonds beat Hearts. Hearts beat Spades. Spades beat Clubs.
8.Winning a Round adds your opponent's card to your deck.
9.Keep Playing until one player has every card in their deck."
